hero.title: Smart Farming, Brighter Future
hero.description: Leverage AI to make informed decisions, optimize resources, and secure your agricultural success.

reports.title: Recent Reports
reports.description: A summary of the latest generated reports.

features.climateRiskDescription: Predict pest attacks, disease outbreaks, and extreme weather events with AI-powered forecasting.
features.profitPlannerDescription: Discover the most profitable crop combinations for your land, budget, and soil conditions.
features.marketplaceDescription: Connect with buyers, suppliers, and logistics providers automatically through our smart marketplace.
features.plantDoctorDescription: Upload an image of a plant to diagnose diseases and get fertilizer recommendations.
features.soilAnalysisDescription: Get AI-driven soil analysis and fertilizer recommendations based on your soil's composition.
features.irrigationDescription: Monitor and control your farm's irrigation zones with real-time data and smart controls.
features.cropManagementDescription: Track the health and progress of your crops from planting to harvest.
features.equipmentDescription: Monitor the status, fuel levels, and efficiency of your farm equipment in real-time.
features.govtSchemesDescription: Access important government schemes and manage your documents like your Aadhar card.
